API

Primary API for warp gate operations.

  1. Home
  2. API

API

warpgate

Top level (global) symbol providing access to all Warp Gate API functions

.warpgate.abstract

Warp Gate classes suitable for extension

.warpgate.crosshairs

Crosshairs API Functions

.warpgate.dnd5e

System specific helpers

.warpgate.event

Event system API functions.

.warpgate.plugin

APIs intended for warp gate "pylons" (e.g. Warp Gate-dependent modules)

.warpgate.util

Utility functions for common queries and operations
